name: GhostyHunter
description:
▫Game made in 1 week for the BrackeysGamJam 2022. With the theme "It is not real".

⚪About:

▫The game is about hunting ghosts but be carefull because not all of them are "REAL".

⚪Controls:

🎮

▫A/S/D/W -> Move

▫Space -> Jump

▫LMouse -> Shoot

▫Q -> Transform in Ghost

▫Since i'm a beginner there might be some bugs.
